HomePage.first-paragraph: Established by Ufuk Enerji Elektrik Üretim A.Ş in 2015 in the districts of Kepsut and Susurluk in Balıkesir, the Poyrazgölü Wind Power Plant is an energy production facility aimed at enhancing Turkey's energy supply security while prioritizing environmental sustainability. With an installed capacity of 48.5 MWe and 21 wind turbines, Poyrazgölü WPP stands as a significant project in the renewable energy sector, playing a crucial role in meeting our nation's demand for clean energy.
HomePage.second-paragraph: Equipped with a total of 17 x 2.3 MW and 4 x 2.35 MW state-of-the-art turbines, the Poyrazgölü Wind Power Plant has an annual energy production capacity sufficient to meet the energy needs of hundreds of thousands of households. By generating electricity from renewable sources, our plant contributes to reducing carbon emissions and represents a critical step toward achieving our sustainable energy goals.
